channel.title: Need help with cache downloader!
channel.description:
Guys i cant get my client to download my cache!I've put the link to the cache into cachedownloader and stuff but it wont download it just says Requesting title screen and Error connecting!Please Help! skype : dasmokeofny
Edit:I get this error!
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\mypc\LegacyXPVPZ\Data\Maps\mapConfig .txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:176) at client.startUp(client.java:8302) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:84) at client.run(client.java:5291) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:724)

item.title: Need help with cache downloader!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I am purely assuming at this point but at the part in the client class where it discusses the mapConfig txt file (which is used for 508 maps cause the others are preloaded if I remember correctly) so you should just be able to comment out that part and it will load the older ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with cache downloader!
item.dc:creator: @Eloy Eloy
item.description:
@Eloy wrote:

I dont know how to do neither :o can u add me on skype?

item.title: Need help with cache downloader!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

you have two options:

-remove 508 maps
-rewrite your own code you choose

item.title: Need help with cache downloader!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

it’s unzipping the maps before they are actually downloaded…if you look in the client class and follow that error message you will see the issue.

Read full topic
